info.name: Choco Lace deviantArt (beta)
info.description:
Transforms DeviantArt's into a lacy chocolate theme.
(around 95% done, just a few more small things to patch up to make it perfect)
info.additionalInfo:
**still under beta mode, some small areas still need work**

update log: 
nov. 14: more small fixes. submission page fix, fixed part of group pages, added more icons, changed some colors in some areas so it looks better. 


if you have any questions/need for assistance, leave a comment on the deviation page, i will assist you ^^

deviation page: http://kokotea.deviantart.com/art/Choco-Lace-deviantArt-BETA-627415316
please favorite if using!

options.label: yes
